definition: net-like object/to hold sth in place with a net/to wind/to twist/(TCM) channels in the human body

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Who is the man with the beard?
sentences.chinese: 那個長着絡腮鬍子的人是誰？

sentences.english: He shaved off his beard but kept his moustache.
sentences.chinese: 他颳了下巴上的絡腮鬍子，但仍留着嘴邊的鬍髭。

sentences.english: Would you like me to shave off your beard?
sentences.chinese: 要我把您的絡腮鬍子刮掉嗎？

sentences.english: Listen to the tape then answer this question. Who is the man with the beard?
sentences.chinese: 聽錄音，然後回答問題。那個長着絡腮鬍子的人是誰？

sentences.english: But they all have full beards .
He has decided to grow a beard and a moustache.
sentences.chinese: 他已經決定留起絡腮鬍子和髭。
